definition: to prick/to run or stick (a needle etc) into/jug (a classifier for liquids such as beer)
to tie/to bind/classifier for flowers, banknotes etc: bundle/Taiwan pr. [zha2]

sentences.english: It commemorates the assassination of Iranian professor Ayatollah Morteza Motahhari.
sentences.chinese: 它是为了纪念刺杀伊朗教授阿亚图拉莫尔塔扎。

definition: Suleiman (name)/General Michel Suleiman (1948-), Lebanese military man and politician, president of Lebanon 2008-2014
Mohammed (c. 570-632), central figure of Islam and prophet of God/also written 穆罕默德
